summary: This document contains multiple passenger manifests for JEGE, Inc. flights (registration N908JE, a Boeing 727-31) from 2004, listing Jeffrey Epstein as the sole passenger on several trips. The manifests record flight details including pilots, destinations, and fuel usage, providing evidence of Epstein's private air travel patterns.

events.title: Multiple Private Flights
events.description: Several private flights operated by JEGE, Inc. (aircraft N908JE) with Jeffrey Epstein as passenger.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was the sole passenger listed on multiple private flights in 2004 aboard his Boeing 727-31 (registration N908JE) operated by JEGE, Inc.
The flight manifests document operational details including pilots (Dave Rodgers, Larry Visoski), flight engineers (Larry Morrison, Ralph Pascal), and flight metrics (distance, fuel, altitude).
The documents are part of the Epstein flight log records, which have been significant in investigations into his travel patterns and potential co-travelers.
The manifests show flights originating from and destined for locations partially legible as possibly including New York (NY), Pennsylvania (PA), and Florida (FL).
